meanings.definition: Amanitas: a genus of poisonous mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with colorful amanitas.
meanings.sent2: I found some amanitas growing near the fallen tree.
meanings.sent3: The amanitas decided to have a party in the damp soil.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of amanitas, beautiful yet dangerous.
meanings.sent5: The bright red cap of the amanitas warned of its toxicity.

meanings.definition: Amanitas: a type of mushroom known for its distinctive appearance and toxicity.
meanings.sent1: The amanitas in the field were easy to spot with their white spots.
meanings.sent2: She avoided picking the amanitas due to their poisonous nature.
meanings.sent3: The amanitas wore tiny hats to a fancy mushroom party.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a carpet of amanitas, a deadly beauty.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the amanitas lingered in the air, a warning to all who passed by.
